title: Aminé - Charmander (2021)
description: In the 2021 music video "Charmander" by Aminé, the artist retreats to a secluded cabin in the woods, symbolizing a quest for peace and introspection away from the pressures of fame. The video is characterized by a warm, earthy color palette and natural light, capturing the tranquil beauty of the forest setting. The nostalgic reference to Pokémon through the title "Charmander" adds a whimsical contrast to the mature themes of self-discovery and isolation.

alt_text: Pharrell Williams - Cash In Cash Out
title: Pharrell Williams - Cash In Cash Out (2022)
description: "Cash In Cash Out" is a song produced by American musician Pharrell Williams, featuring vocals from Atlanta-based rapper 21 Savage and American rapper Tyler, the Creator. Written by all three, it was released as a single through Columbia Records on June 10, 2022. Williams first teased the song on his TikTok account June 6, 2022. An accompanying music video was released, featuring a zoetrope-inspired CG animation style.
